title: Notifications
booking_request.title: New Booking Request
booking_request.message: {{clientName}} has requested a {{duration}}-minute session on {{date}} at {{time}}.
booking_request.email.subject: New booking request from {{clientName}}
booking_request.email.headline: You've got a new request!
booking_request.email.main_body_text: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, {{clientName}} would like to book a '{{sessionType}}' session with you on {{date}} at {{time}}. Does this work for you? Please respond as soon as you can.
booking_confirmed.title: Booking Confirmed
booking_confirmed.message: Your {{duration}}-minute session with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}} has been confirmed.
booking_confirmed.email.subject: Your booking is confirmed!
booking_confirmed.email.headline: Great, it's official!
booking_confirmed.email.main_body_text: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, your booking for a '{{sessionType}}' session with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}} is all set. We're looking forward to it!
booking_confirmed_for_coach.email.main_b: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, {{clientName}} has just booked and paid for a '{{sessionType}}' session with you for {{date}} at {{time}}. Your calendar has been updated.
booking_declined.title: Booking Declined
booking_declined.message: Unfortunately, your session with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}} has been declined.
booking_cancelled.title: Booking Cancelled
booking_cancelled.message: Your session with {{name}} on {{date}} at {{time}} has been cancelled.
session_reminder.title: Upcoming Session Reminder
session_reminder.message: Don’t forget! Your session starts in {{reminderMinutes}} minutes at {{time}}.
session_reminder.email.subject: Reminder: Your session is in 24 hours
session_reminder.email.headline: Your session is tomorrow!
session_reminder.email.main_body_text: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, just a friendly reminder that your '{{sessionType}}' session with {{coachName}} is scheduled for tomorrow, {{date}}, at {{time}}. Get ready, it's going to be great!
session_starting.title: Session Starting Soon
session_starting.message: Get ready! Your session starts in {{timeUntilStart}} minutes.
session_starting_now.title: Session Starting Now
session_starting_now.message: It’s time! Your session is starting now.
payment_confirmed.title: Payment Confirmed
payment_confirmed.message: Your payment of {{amount}} for the session on {{date}} has been confirmed.
payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.message: Oops! Your payment of {{amount}} for your session on {{date}} has failed. Please update your payment method.
reviewPrompt.title: Review Your Session
reviewPrompt.message: Share your feedback about your session.
reviewPrompt.coach.title: Review your session with {{name}}
reviewPrompt.coach.message: Tell us your feedback about your session with {{name}}. Your opinion helps us improve!
reviewPrompt.coach.email.subject: Review your session with {{name}}
reviewPrompt.coach.email.headline: How was the session for you?
reviewPrompt.coach.email.main_body_text: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, the session with {{name}} is now complete. Your feedback helps us improve the platform and also gives the client valuable insight.
reviewPrompt.client.title: How was your session with {{name}}?
reviewPrompt.client.message: 90% of clients give feedback – tell us about your session with {{name}} to help others choose the right coach!
reviewPrompt.client.email.subject: How was your session with {{name}}?
reviewPrompt.client.email.headline: Share your experience!
reviewPrompt.client.email.main_body_text: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, we hope you had a great session with {{name}}. Your feedback is super important—for us, for {{name}}, and for other clients. Please take a moment to share your thoughts.
empty: You’re all caught up! No new notifications.
error: Oops! We couldn’t load your notifications. Please try again.
booking_confirmed_with_payment.message: Your session is confirmed! Please complete payment to attend.
payment_reminder.title: Complete Payment
payment_reminder.message: Your session with {{coachName}} is in less than 24 hours. Please complete payment to attend.
payment_reminder.email.subject: Please complete your payment
payment_reminder.email.headline: Just one more step
payment_reminder.email.main_body_text: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, your session with {{coachName}} is less than 24 hours away. To attend, please complete the outstanding payment.
payment_received.message: We've received your payment of {{amount}} {{currency}} for the session on {{date}}.
payment_received.email.subject: Your payment has been confirmed
payment_received.email.headline: Payment successful!
payment_received.email.main_body_text: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, we're confirming receipt of your payment of {{amount}} {{currency}} for your session on {{date}}. Your invoice is attached.
payment_received_for_webinar.message: We've received your payment of {{amount}} {{currency}} for the webinar "{{webinarTitle}}" with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}}.
bookingConfirmedWithPaymentMessage: Your session with {coachName} on {date} at {time} (duration: {duration} min) is confirmed. The payment of {amount} {currency} has been successfully processed.
payment_made_by_user.title: Payment Received from Client
payment_made_by_user.message: {{clientName}} has made the payment of {{amount}} {{currency}} for the session on {{date}}.
payment_received.title: We've received your payment
completePaymentToUnlock: Please complete payment to unlock the link
overtime_payment_captured_message: The overtime payment of {{amount}} {{currency}} has been successfully charged.
overtime_payment_released_message: The pre-authorization for the session extension has been released as no additional charges were incurred.
overtime_payment_collected_message: The overtime payment of {{amount}} {{currency}} for the session with {{clientName}} has been successfully collected.
overtime_payment_capture_failed_message: Failed to capture overtime payment for session {{sessionId}}. Error: {{error}}. Please review the details or contact support.
session_ended_message_coach: Your session with {{userName}} has ended. Reason: {{reason}}. Payment status: {{captureStatus}}.
session_ended_message_client: Your session with {{coachName}} has ended. Reason: {{reason}}. Payment status: {{captureStatus}}.
OVERTIME_PROMPT.title: Overtime
defaultMessage: You have a new notification regarding {{name}}.
webinar_registration_confirmed_client.me: Your registration for the webinar "{{webinarTitle}}" with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}} is confirmed! Please complete the payment to secure your spot.
webinar_registration_confirmed_client.em: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, thanks for registering for the "{{webinarTitle}}" webinar with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}}. We've reserved your spot. See you there!
webinar_registration_confirmed_client_pa: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, your registration for the "{{webinarTitle}}" webinar with {{coachName}} is almost complete. Please complete the payment to secure your spot.
webinar_new_attendee_coach.title: New Attendee for Webinar
webinar_registration_confirmed_client.me: Your registration for the webinar "{{webinarTitle}}" with {{coachName}} on {{date}} at {{time}} is confirmed. We look forward to seeing you!
webinar_new_attendee_coach.message: {{attendeeName}} has registered for your webinar "{{webinarTitle}}" ({{date}} at {{time}}). Current attendee count: {{currentAttendeeCount}}.
webinar_new_attendee_coach.email.subject: New attendee for your "{{webinarTitle}}" webinar
webinar_new_attendee_coach.email.main_bo: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, {{attendeeName}} has just registered for your "{{webinarTitle}}" webinar. That's fantastic! The current attendee count is now {{currentAttendeeCount}}.
reschedule_confirmed_auto_client.title: Session Successfully Rescheduled
reschedule_confirmed_auto_client.message: Your '{{sessionType}}' session with {{name}} has been successfully rescheduled from {{oldDate}} {{oldTime}} to {{newDate}} {{newTime}}.
reschedule_confirmed_auto_client.email.s: Your session has been successfully rescheduled
reschedule_confirmed_auto_client.email.m: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, as discussed, your '{{sessionType}}' session with {{name}} has been successfully moved to {{newDate}} at {{newTime}}. We've updated everything for you.
reschedule_confirmed_auto_coach.title: Session Automatically Rescheduled
reschedule_confirmed_auto_coach.message: The '{{sessionType}}' session with {{name}} has been automatically rescheduled from {{oldDate}} {{oldTime}} to {{newDate}} {{newTime}} based on the client's request.
reschedule_request_sent_to_coach.title: Reschedule Request Sent
reschedule_request_sent_to_coach.message: Your reschedule request for the '{{sessionTitle}}' session with {{coachName}} (originally {{originalDate}} {{originalTime}}) has been sent. You'll be notified once the coach responds.
booking_cancelled_by_you.title: Booking Cancelled
booking_cancelled_by_you.message: You have cancelled your session with {{coachName}} on {{sessionDate}} at {{sessionTime}}. {{refundDetails}}
booking_cancelled_by_you.email.subject: Your cancellation is confirmed
booking_cancelled_by_you.email.headline: Cancellation Confirmed
booking_cancelled_by_you.email.main_body: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, this confirms the cancellation of your session with {{coachName}} on {{sessionDate}} at {{sessionTime}}. {{refundDetails}} Sorry it didn't work out this time, maybe next time!
client_cancelled_booking.title: Booking Cancelled by Client
client_cancelled_booking.message: {{clientName}} has cancelled the '{{sessionTitle}}' session on {{sessionDate}} at {{sessionTime}}. Reason: {{cancellationReason}}. Your availability has been updated.
client_cancelled_booking.email.subject: Cancellation from {{clientName}}

client_cancelled_booking.email.main_body: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, {{clientName}} has cancelled the '{{sessionTitle}}' session on {{sessionDate}} at {{sessionTime}}. We've updated your calendar accordingly and made that time available again.

booking_cancelled_by_coach.email.main_bo: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, unfortunately {{coachName}} had to cancel your '{{sessionTitle}}' session on {{sessionDate}} at {{sessionTime}}. We're sorry for the inconvenience. A full refund of {{refundAmount}} {{refundCurrency}} is already on its way to you.
booking_cancelled_by_coach.message_webin: {{coachName}} has cancelled the webinar '{{sessionTitle}}' ({{sessionDate}} at {{sessionTime}}). Reason: {{cancellationReason}}. All attendees will receive a full refund.

program_purchase_confirmed.title: Program Purchase Confirmed!
program_purchase_confirmed.message: Welcome aboard! You've unlocked '{{programTitle}}'. Dive in and start learning now!
program_purchase_confirmed.email.subject: Welcome to "{{programTitle}}"!
program_purchase_confirmed.email.main_bo: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, great decision! You've just unlocked the '{{programTitle}}' program. We wish you success and enjoyment in your learning. You can start right away.
program_sale_coach.title: New Program Sale!
program_sale_coach.email.subject: Your program "{{programTitle}}" was sold!
program_sale_coach.email.headline: New Sale! Congratulations!
program_sale_coach.email.main_body_text: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, great news! {{clientName}} just purchased your program '{{programTitle}}' for {{amount}} {{currency}}. Keep up the great work!
paymentSuccessEnrollmentConfirmed: Payment successful! You're being redirected to the program.
new_program_review.title: New Program Review
new_program_review.message: {{reviewerName}} left a {{rating}}-star review for your program "{{programTitle}}".

program_assignment_submitted.message: {{studentName}} has submitted an assignment for the lesson "{{lessonTitle}}" in your program "{{programTitle}}".
program_completed.title: Program Completed!
program_completed.message: Congratulations! You've successfully completed the program "{{programTitle}}".

program_comment_reply.message: There's a reply to your comment in the lesson "{{lessonTitle}}".

live_session_receipt_client.title: Receipt for Your Live Session
live_session_receipt_client.message: Your {{durationInMinutes}} min {{durationInSecondsRemainder}} sec session with {{coachName}} is complete. Your final cost was {{finalCost}} {{currency}}.
live_session_earnings_coach.title: New Live Session Earnings
live_session_earnings_coach.message: Your {{durationInMinutes}} min {{durationInSecondsRemainder}} sec session with {{clientName}} earned you {{netPayout}} {{currency}} ({{grossRevenue}} gross revenue - {{platformFee}} platform fee).
new_earning_coach.title: New Earning Received
new_earning_coach.message: You have received a new credit of {{netAmount}} {{currency}} for a transaction with {{clientName}}.
new_earning_coach.email.subject: You have a new earning!
new_earning_coach.email.headline: Well done!
new_earning_coach.email.main_body_text: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, you've received a new credit of {{netAmount}} {{currency}} for a transaction with {{clientName}}. Your earnings summary has been updated.
financials_payoutStatusTooltip_on_hold: This payout is being held by an administrator and will not be processed until released.
financials_holdReasonPrompt: Please provide an internal reason for holding this payout. This reason will be audited and shared with the coach in their notification.
financials_holdReasonRequired: A reason is required to hold a payout.
payout_on_hold_title: A Payout Has Been Placed on Hold
payout_on_hold_message: Your payout of {{payoutAmount}} {{currency}} has been temporarily placed on hold by an administrator. Reason: {{adminReason}}. Please contact support for more information.
payout_on_hold.email.subject: Important update on your payout
payout_on_hold.email.headline: Your payout has been placed on hold
payout_on_hold.email.main_body_text: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, your payout of {{payoutAmount}} {{currency}} has been temporarily placed on hold by an administrator. Reason: {{adminReason}}. Please contact our support team if you have any questions.
payout_released_message: Your previously held payout of {{payoutAmount}} {{currency}} has been released and will be processed in the next cycle.
payout_released.email.subject: Your payout has been released
payout_released.email.headline: Good news about your payout!
payout_released.email.main_body_text: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, your previously held payout of {{payoutAmount}} {{currency}} has now been released and will be processed in the next payout cycle.
refund_request_for_coach.title: Client Requests Refund
refund_request_for_coach.message: {{clientName}} has requested a refund for the session "{{sessionTitle}}". Please review the request.
refund_request_for_coach.email.subject: A client has requested a refund
refund_request_for_coach.email.headline: Refund Request Received
refund_request_for_coach.email.main_body: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, {{clientName}} has requested a refund for the session '{{sessionTitle}}'. Please review the details and decide on the next steps.
refund_processed_coach.title: Refund Processed
refund_processed_coach.message: A refund of {{refundAmount}} {{currency}} has been processed. Your earnings account will be debited {{coachDebitAmount}} {{currency}}.
refund_request_escalated.title: Request Escalated to Support
refund_request_escalated.message: Your refund request has been escalated to support for a final decision.
refund_processed_client.title: Refund Processed
refund_processed_client.message: We have processed a refund of {{refundAmount}} {{currency}} for your session "{{sessionTitle}}". It may take a few business days to appear on your account.
refund_processed_client.email.subject: Your refund is on its way
refund_processed_client.email.headline: Refund Processed
refund_processed_client.email.main_body_: Hi {{clientFirstName}}, we've just processed a refund of {{refundAmount}} {{currency}} for your session '{{sessionTitle}}'. The funds should appear in your account within the next few business days.
refund_request_client_escalated.title: Request Escalated to Support
refund_request_client_escalated.message: You have escalated your request regarding the session "{{sessionTitle}}" to support. Our team will review the case and get back to you.
user_account_warning.title: Official Warning On Your Account
user_account_warning.message: This is an official warning ({{warning_count}} of 2) for activity that violates our community guidelines on **{{flag_reason_translation}}**. Any more violations will result in account suspension. We recommend you review our [community guidelines](link-to-guidelines) to avoid future issues.
user_account_warning.email.subject: Important Information About Your Account
user_account_warning.email.headline: An Official Warning
user_account_warning.email.main_body_tex: Hi {{firstName}}, this is an official warning regarding an activity that violates our guidelines on **{{flag_reason_translation}}**. We ask that you carefully review our community guidelines to avoid future issues. Further violations may result in your account being suspended.
report_actioned.title: Update on Your Report
report_actioned.message: Thanks for helping keep our community safe. We've reviewed your report and taken appropriate action according to our guidelines. Your contribution is greatly appreciated.
user_content_hidden.title: Your Content Was Hidden
user_content_hidden.message: A piece of your content ("{{truncated_review_comment}}") was hidden because it violates our policy on **{{flag_reason_translation}}**. Please review our community guidelines. If you believe this was a mistake, you can [appeal the decision](appeal).
user_account_suspended.title: Your Account Has Been Suspended
user_account_suspended.message: Your account has been suspended for {{suspension_duration}} due to repeated or severe violations of our policy on **{{flag_reason_translation}}**. During this time, your account will be in **{{suspension_type}}** mode. The suspension will be automatically lifted on {{suspension_end_date}}. If you believe this was a mistake, you can [appeal the decision](appeal).
user_account_suspended.email.subject: Your account has been temporarily suspended
user_account_suspended.email.headline: Your Account Has Been Suspended
user_account_suspended.email.main_body_t: Hi {{firstName}}, due to violations of our guidelines on **{{flag_reason_translation}}**, your account has been suspended for {{suspension_duration}}. During this time, your account will be in **{{suspension_type}}** mode. The suspension ends on {{suspension_end_date}}. If you believe this is an error, you can appeal the decision.
report_dismissed.title: Update on Your Report
report_dismissed.message: After review, we found the content you reported doesn't violate our community guidelines. We still appreciate you taking the time to help us out.
coach_verification_approved.title: Insurance Verification Approved
coach_verification_approved.message: Your insurance verification has been successfully reviewed and approved. The 'Platform-Verified' badge is now visible on your profile.
coach_verification_approved.email.main_b: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, we've reviewed your documents and are happy to let you know that your profile is now verified. The 'Platform-Verified' badge is now visible to everyone.
coach_verification_rejected.title: Insurance Verification Rejected
coach_verification_rejected.message: Your insurance verification could not be approved. Reason: **{{rejection_reason}}**. Please resubmit a valid document in your settings.
coach_verification_rejected.email.main_b: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, unfortunately, we were unable to approve your insurance verification. Reason: **{{rejection_reason}}**. Please upload a valid document in your settings so we can complete the review.
verification_expiring_soon.title: Verification Expiring Soon
verification_expiring_soon.message: Your verified insurance document will expire on {{expiry_date}}. Please upload a new document in your settings to maintain your status.
welcome.email.subject: Welcome aboard!
welcome.email.headline: We're so glad you're here!
welcome.email.main_body_text: Hi {{firstName}}, welcome! We're thrilled to have you in our community. Take a look around, discover coaches and programs, and start your journey.
email_verification.email.subject: Please confirm your email address
email_verification.email.headline: Almost there!
email_verification.email.main_body_text: Hi {{firstName}}, welcome! Please click the button below to confirm your email address and fully activate your account.
password_reset.email.subject: Reset your password
password_reset.email.headline: Reset Your Password
password_reset.email.main_body_text: Hi {{firstName}}, you requested to reset your password. Click the button below to set a new one. If this wasn't you, you can safely ignore this email.
payout_initiated_coach.email.subject: Your payout is on its way!
payout_initiated_coach.email.headline: Money is on the move!
payout_initiated_coach.email.main_body_t: Hi {{coachFirstName}}, we've just initiated your payout of {{payoutAmount}} {{currency}}. The funds should arrive in your account within a few business days.
